summary: Viral videos are those that spread rapidly online, gaining popularity through sharing. They often focus on humor, like "Gangnam Style," which became the most-watched YouTube video in 2012, reaching 1 billion views in just 5 months. Other examples include comedy sketches and unexpected events captured on camera. The growth of views can be incredible, as seen in the weekly peak of "Gangnam Style" in its 11th week. Over time, these videos maintain a steady growth in views.
title: Viral video
